50 class PL_DLL_API plValues : public plSampleSpaceObject
51 {
52  friend class plValuesAccess;
53  protected:
54  SPL_ACCESS2(plValues);
55 
56  /* The list of variables for which the values are stored */
57  kplVariableList variable_list_;
58 
59  typedef std::map <kplVariable const *, int> t_map_vector;
60  /* A map, mapping each variable into a position for recovering its value */
61  t_map_vector map_vector_;
62 
63  /* An array of values assosiated to each of the variables */
64  plDataValues *values_;
65 
66  /* A boolean stating whether the container is responsible for \em value_ or not.
67  This is needed because \em values_ may be set by pointer.
68  \sa set_values_address
69  */
70  bool values_to_be_deleted_;
71 
72 
73  private:
74  const plData& value_for_variable(kplVariable const * variable) const;
75  plData& value_for_variable(kplVariable const * variable);
76  void destroy();
77  void finalise_construction();

93  explicit plValues (const plSymbol &variable);
94 
95  /* Internal method: Create a plValues allowing to store the value of the
96  variable conjunction \em vars and initialize its value to the first value
97  of the conjunction
98  */
99  explicit plValues (const kplVariableList &vars);
100 
101  /* Internal method: Create a plValues allowing to store the values of the
102  variable conjunction \em vars and initialize its value to \em val
103  */
104  plValues (const kplVariableList &vars, const plDataValues &val);

291  plFloat support_area() const;
292 
293  /* Internal method: Uses a given address as the current value array */
294  inline void set_values_address(plDataValues *val)
295  {
296  if(values_to_be_deleted_) delete values_;
297  values_ = val;
298  values_to_be_deleted_ = false;
299  }
300 
301  /* Internal method: Get a reference the value array */
302  inline plDataValues &values()
303  {
304  assert(values_);
305  //assert(values_to_be_deleted_);
306  return *values_;
307  }
308 
309  /* Internal method: Get a const reference the value array */
310  inline const plDataValues &values()const
311  {
312  assert(values_);
313  return *values_;
314  }
315 
316  /* Internal method: Return the values of a list of variables */
317  void to_data_values(const kplVariableList &variable, plDataValues *ptr,
318  std::vector<bool> &definition) const;
319 
320  /* Internal method: Return the values of a list of variables */
321  void to_data_values(const kplVariableList &variable, plDataValues *ptr) const;
322 
323  /* Internal method: Set the value of a given variable if the variable is in
324  the container variables and returns true. Returns false otherwise
325  */
326  bool set_variable_value(const kplVariable *variable, const plData &value);
